import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import AdminNavbar from '../NavBar/AdminNavbar.jsx'; import './updateitem.css'; const Updateitem = () => { const { itemid } = useParams(); const [values, setValues] = useState({ itemid:itemid, itemname: '', description: '', startingPrice: '', bidEndTime: '', imageData: '', }); return (

Update Item Details Form

); } export default Updateitem;
